cab.content: SECRET. . , 235 m WAR CABINET.0*1*958. PUBLICATION OF THE REPORT OE THE MESOPOTAMIA COMMISSION. (Oopy-adTXetter from Secretary, Admiralty to Seoretary-i War -r ADMIRALTY. 30th May 1917.Sir, In reply to your letter of the 24th instant, addressed to theFirst Sea Lord, I am oomniajidBd"^1^ML y'^ Commies loners of theAdmiralty to acquaint you that, so far as the possible disclosureof naval information is concerned, they see no objeotion to thepublication of the report of the Mesopotamia Commission. Thecopy of the report (Serial No. 11) is returned herewith. I am, etc., (Sgd) W.GRAHAM GREENE.Lieutenant-Colonel, Sir M.P.A.Hankey, K.C.B., 2 Whitehall Gardens. S.W. (1).
